medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient developed severe right upper quadrant pain suddenly, approximately 36 hours prior to presentation after eating; has experienced nausea without vomiting and mild dry heaving. The abdominal pain is described as much worse than any previous episodes.
medical_history.social_history: Patient smokes marijuana frequently and cigarettes but has not smoked either in the last 36 hours since the pain started.
